title: Special Delivery

details.label: Completed Size
details.info: 4.3 x 4.3 inches or 10.9 x 10.9 cm on 14 count aida

story: A cat makes its way along a wrought iron fence, guided by the gentle shimmer of fireflies. With determined strides, it carries a delivery of utmost importance, each step measured and deliberate, reflecting a quiet confidence in the face of the approaching storm.
